manipulators.description: Ctrl + U to delete backward from point to the beginning of line.
Ctrl + W to delete word behind point

rules.description: Ctrl + B/F to move between words

manipulators.description: Ctrl + W to delete word behind point
Ctrl + W to delete word behind point

rules.description: Function keys for left hand - movement, brightness, volumen and media controls
Function keys for right hand - movement, brightness, volumen and media controls
Numpad in left hand, symbols and arrows in right hand

manipulators.description: from right_option+g to shell command "open -a "/Applications/Google Chrome.app""
from right_option+t to shell command "open -a "/System/Volumes/Data/Applications/Microsoft To Do.app""
from right_option+v to shell command "open -a "/Applications/Visual Studio Code.app""
right_option+left_command to left_control+left_shift, send spacebar on tap
spacebar to left_command, send return_or_enter on tap
left_command to left_shift, send spacebar on tap
right_command to right_shift, send escape on tap
left_option to left_control, send quote on tap
right_option to right_option, send grave_accent_and_tilde on tap
